alert.note: Alert for Kossuth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:54PM CDT until June 25 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KOSSUTH COUNTY... At 1154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sexton, or 8 miles northeast of Algona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Algona, Burt, Titonka, Wesley, St. Benedict, Irvington, Sexton, Algona Municipal Airport and Aa Call State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
